state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal! -= Bathroom =- Well, here we are in a bathroom. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Bathroom =-0/1
next_state: -= Corridor =- You arrive in a corridor. An usual one. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is not blocked by one. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, there is no door. There is an exit to the west. > -= Corridor =-0/2

state: -= Corridor =- You arrive in a corridor. An usual one. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is not blocked by one. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, there is no door. There is an exit to the west. > -= Corridor =-0/2
next_state: -= Kitchen =- You've just walked into a kitchen. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? You can make out a fridge. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The fridge contains a fried block of cheese and a raw red tuna. You make out an oven. You shudder, but continue examining the room. You can see a table. You shudder, but continue examining the table. The table is massive. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a counter! On the counter you make out a fried yellow potato, a yellow apple, a raw red potato, a tomato, a red apple, a green hot pepper, a green apple, a cookbook and a knife. You see a stove. You shudder, but continue examining the stove. The stove is conventional. But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the stove! oh well. There is an open frosted-glass door leading south. You need an exit without a door? You should try going east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Kitchen =-0/3

admissible_commands: take block of cheese from fridge
take green hot pepper from counter
